title: Missing Mastery 7 Tokens

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I already have 2 Mastery 7 Tokens for Leona and I have not been receiving the 3rd. Over the course of the last two months I have gotten 4 or 5 S rank games. Not S-, S rank on Summoner's rift. Originally I didn't worry about it but I have been playing more often and it's started to bother me. Please let me know what other details I need to Provide to get this fixed. I added the link to my most recent game above. Below is my full match history.

Summoner Name: TheBravestBooty
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/49163980

replies.body: Meta and gameplay may shuffle a bit with the new season, that could mean that getting an S could be easier or higher depending on the champ or role.  I looked into this for you, but didn't see anything out of the ordinary.  In fact, it looks like you already have 3 tokens!  You may need to restart your client, your loot might have lost sync and didn't update the token in your inventory.  Grats! :D
Thanks for the reply! Definitely a sync problem. After the next game I played, I was notified that a token entered my loot! Figures once I said something it corrected its self. Thanks for you help :)
